thread.title: Great place to stay in NY - Review
thread.title_full: Great place to stay in NY - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 313colleens
title: Great place to stay in NY - Review
text: From the moment we walked in the door until the time you left you were treated special, every hotel staff we came upon was kind. Check itnot and check out was a breeze. The people at the front desk was exceptional. We will definitely go back and highly recommend staying at the Andaz.
